greeting.title: AVTELMA SMARTTRAFFIC
greeting.text: Traffic lights that work for you

capabilities.title: Sensor
capabilities.text: The sensor installed on traffic light registers color change and calculates the colot-changing schedule

capabilities.title: BLE
capabilities.text: Using BLE, gathered data is send to every available device (drivers’ samrtphones)

capabilities.title: Car
capabilities.text: Drivers’ smartphones are receiving and spreading the data using internet

capabilities.title: Data channel
capabilities.text: Every driver regardless of their locations get the information about traffic light schedule on their routes

device.text: - Compact and almost invisible on the traffic light
- Over a year of a life-span
- Minimum of two devices for one traffic light

elements.title: View traffic lights in real time
elements.text: By including the information gathered from devices to modern age navigation software, you can view traffic lights on route with timers in real time

elements.title: Adjust road behavior
elements.text: The information can help the driver to adjust their road behavior according to the current traffic situation and\or select alternative routes

elements.title: Stay in the green wave
elements.text: The solution integrated with navigation software allows the possibility to calculate the optimal driving speed in real time to spend as less time at traffic stop as possible

benefits.title: Benefits
greenLight: - Less fuel consumption. By reducing the time vehicles idle at red light, it is possible to reduce urban fuel consumption for drivers
- Less wear and tear. The less vehicle stops and starts again – the less gearbox and other mechanical parts are weared
- Less traffic accidents. There are less probability to be in a road accident while moving constantly
redLight: - More fuel consumption. Standing on the red light is basically burning your fuel with no reason
- More wear and tear. The more you have to change your gear the less it will serve
- The more you have to stop and start again in the traffic or at intersections the more you are at risk of an accident
